var output = [
    {payload: msg.payload.info[0].slave_id},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].battery_capacity},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].battery_voltage / 10},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].charge_current / 100},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].controller_temperature},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].battery_temperature},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].load_voltage / 10},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].load_current / 100},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].load_power},
    {payload: msg.payload.info[0].load_status},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].pv_voltage / 10},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].pv_current / 100},
    {payload : msg.payload.info[0].pv_power},
    { payload: msg.payload.info[0].load_mode }
]

return output;

name: function 5
func:
var output = [
    {payload: msg.payload.setting[0].slave_id},
    {payload : msg.payload.setting[0].over_voltage_threshold},
    {payload : msg.payload.setting[0].charging_limit_voltage},
    { payload: msg.payload.setting[0].overdischarge_recovery_voltage},
    { payload: msg.payload.setting[0].undervoltage_threshold},
    { payload: msg.payload.setting[0].overdischarge_voltage},
    { payload: msg.payload.setting[0].overdischarge_limit_voltage},
    { payload: msg.payload.setting[0].overdischarge_time_delay},
    { payload: msg.payload.setting[0].temperature_compensation},
    { payload: msg.payload.setting[0].load_mode}
]

return output;
